pageContext.claim: “I could have not let anyone speak during the Mueller report including lawyers and everybody that works at the White House, and executive privilege, they call it, some people say Presidential privilege, which is at a very high level. I could have said, 'Nope, Presidential privilege.' But I said, 'I have nothing to hide.'”
pageContext.analysis: Many White House aides were interviewed by the Special Counsel's office but Trump refused to sit for an interview under oath and only answered a few selected questions in writing.
